name: Zine Maker
description:
Zine Maker is a casual creative experience that lets you drag and drop your own indie magazine.

Taking inspiration from 90s punk, grunge, and skate scenes, Zine Maker lets you create as you want or challenges with a few timed assignments. Created for West Coast Jam 2022 (but not eligible to win).

Programming: Dave Verra
Art: Karen Morrison
Music: James Curtis (Discord: Gendo#8679)
SFX: Karen Morrison

Photos from Unsplash.com
